body_html:
Thanks for your contribution. Sparse update is required in this case because adamax is mainly used with word embeddings. Can you post a comment here after implementing sparse update?
…

body:
Thanks for your contribution. Sparse update is required in this case
because adamax is mainly used with word embeddings. Can you post a comment
here after implementing sparse update?

On 02-Mar-2018 17:09, "Yan Facai (颜发才)" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @dchatterjee172 <https://github.com/dchatterjee172> Not yet. I'll finish
> it in the weekend.
>
> —
